## Constitution Compliance Checklist (Mandatory for All Features)

### Documentation Language Standards (NON-NEGOTIABLE)
- [ ] LANG001 All specifications written in Traditional Chinese (zh-TW)
- [ ] LANG002 User stories in Traditional Chinese
- [ ] LANG003 Acceptance criteria in Traditional Chinese
- [ ] LANG004 UI text and labels in Traditional Chinese
- [ ] LANG005 Error messages in Traditional Chinese
- [ ] LANG006 Code comments use Traditional Chinese where feasible
- [ ] LANG007 API documentation in Traditional Chinese

### Code Quality Standards
- [ ] CQS001 ESLint configured and all warnings resolved
- [ ] CQS002 Prettier formatting applied consistently
- [ ] CQS003 TypeScript strict mode enabled with no errors
- [ ] CQS004 JSDoc comments added for all public APIs
- [ ] CQS005 Code review completed with approval
- [ ] CQS006 No dead code or commented-out code blocks

### Testing Requirements (NON-NEGOTIABLE)
- [ ] TEST001 Tests written BEFORE implementation (TDD)
- [ ] TEST002 Unit test coverage ≥90% verified
- [ ] TEST003 E2E tests pass for all critical user journeys
- [ ] TEST004 Integration tests verify API contracts
- [ ] TEST005 Performance tests validate response times

### User Experience Consistency
- [ ] UX001 Components follow design system patterns
- [ ] UX002 Mobile-first responsive design implemented (768px, 1024px breakpoints)
- [ ] UX003 Loading states implemented for all async operations
- [ ] UX004 Error messages are user-friendly and actionable
- [ ] UX005 WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards met
- [ ] UX006 Keyboard navigation tested
- [ ] UX007 Screen reader compatibility verified

### Performance Requirements
- [ ] PERF001 Page load time ≤2s on 3G verified
- [ ] PERF002 Core Web Vitals meet "Good" thresholds (LCP ≤2.5s, FID ≤100ms, CLS ≤0.1)
- [ ] PERF003 Images optimized (WebP/AVIF format, lazy loading)
- [ ] PERF004 Code splitting implemented
- [ ] PERF005 Database queries optimized with proper indexing
- [ ] PERF006 API responses implement caching where appropriate

### Security & Data Protection
- [ ] SEC001 HTTPS enforced in all environments
- [ ] SEC002 Input validation and sanitization implemented
- [ ] SEC003 SQL injection prevention verified
- [ ] SEC004 XSS vulnerabilities prevented
- [ ] SEC005 Rate limiting implemented on API endpoints
- [ ] SEC006 Payment processing uses PCI-DSS compliant service (if applicable)
- [ ] SEC007 Password hashing with bcrypt ≥12 rounds (if applicable)
- [ ] SEC008 GDPR compliance verified for personal data handling (if applicable)
